__e: I mean, I think any time there's a new technology everyone says, "okay, we have to stand back and think about what this is really gonna mean to society."
And once I took a look back... and I finally understood how everything happened... I decided that no one would ever hurt me again.
But you know, they say hindsight's 20/20, and I see things more clearly now, and I've given this a lot of thought.
I mean when I think about it now, he tried to tell me so many times. And I just wouldn't let him. I didn't want to hear it.
I wasn't close to my father, But I do look back, and I say to myself, You know, "he did...
